name: Bearly Camping
description:
Don't let the bears take all your berries!

Defend your campsite from incoming bears.
Venture into the forest to pick berries to regain your health.
Survive until the time is is up!

This game was developed as a 3 week end of term project at Valla Game Education.

Game design, Programing, 3D-art and Animation made by
Sebastian Björk - 2021
